summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for the period from June 1, 2017, to June 30, 2017. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest payments, indicating the financial activity of the account during this time.

persons.name: Cynthia Rodriguez

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3, St Thomas 00802, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account balance as of June 30, 2017, was $18,028,364.27.
The beginning balance on June 1, 2017, was $18,016,517.80.
There were deposits totaling $11,846.47 during the statement period.
No checks were paid during this period, and there were minimal withdrawals.
The document includes details about service charges and overdraft fees, which were minimal.
